document_data.name: The Simbul's Spell Supremacy
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Simbul's spell supremacy''''' was a [[wizard]] [[spell]] from the school of [[alteration]]. This spell was created by the [[Simbul]] and was rarely used by others.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster's next two spells to be cast requiring only an immediate silent act of will. Spell components were not required regardless of the spells chosen. Both of the selected spells were cast with maximum efficiency with regards to the harm they caused and their duration.
document_data.Components: This spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
